title: [MAC USERS] - Keyboard stops working mid game; sometimes desktop responds instead of client
body:
Sup summoners,

Since the recent patch (7.1 I think), my mac has been simultaneously running my desktop and my league of legends at the same time. The best way to explain this is, whenever I press keys on my keyboard, sometimes my desktop will respond instead of my league client, causing me to not be able to push ability hotkeys, access my keyboard for league at all, etc. In order to access my keyboard again for league, I'll either have to push escape a bunch of times, or tab out and back in.

It's really really been annoying me during gameplay, and I was hoping some of you mac users may be able to help if you have experienced this issue before. 

Please no answers such as: "Your problem is that your playing on a mac pleb."

Thanks fellas.

replies.body: If you recently installed any new software for your keyboard or mouse then that could be getting in the way or overwriting commands.  Otherwise, your config may have become corrupt and may require a reset.  [Reset your config](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#section-mac), making sure to follow the instructions specific to your mac.  I hope that helps!
I'm having the same issue and resetting the config did not solve the issue.

I have the same problem from last update on mac. Nothing new was installed or changed on my mac. WTF rito???
